languages.text: "Вот она, природа "истинной" веры. Стрелять, не задавая вопросов. Жертвовать невинными, не думая о последствиях. Где же твоя человечность, сестра? Мир не делится на черное и белое".

"This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."
languages.original_text: "Вот она, природа "истинной" веры. Стрелять, не задавая вопросов. Жертвовать невинными, не думая о последствиях. Где же твоя человечность, сестра? Мир не делится на черное и белое".

traits.locale_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「これが『本物の』信仰ってもんさ。最初に発砲しといて後から質問を投げかける。後先考えずに無実の人間を犠牲にする。アンタの人間性はどこにあるんだい、シスター？この世は白と黒に分けられやしないんだよ」
languages.original_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: 「これが『本物の』信仰ってもんさ。最初に発砲しといて後から質問を投げかける。後先考えずに無実の人間を犠牲にする。アンタの人間性はどこにあるんだい、シスター？この世は白と黒に分けられやしないんだよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这就是所谓的‘真正’信仰。先开枪，后提问，宁可错杀三千，不可放过一个。你还有人性吗，修女？这个世界并不是非黑即白。”
languages.original_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: “这就是所谓的‘真正’信仰。先开枪，后提问，宁可错杀三千，不可放过一个。你还有人性吗，修女？这个世界并不是非黑即白。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Telle est la nature de la "vraie" foi. Tirer d'abord et poser des questions ensuite. Sacrifier les innocents sans se soucier des conséquences. Où est votre humanité, ma sœur ? Le monde n'est pas aussi tranché. »
languages.original_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: « Telle est la nature de la "vraie" foi. Tirer d'abord et poser des questions ensuite. Sacrifier les innocents sans se soucier des conséquences. Où est votre humanité, ma sœur ? Le monde n'est pas aussi tranché. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «De eso trata la fe "verdadera". De disparar primero y preguntar después, de sacrificar al inocente sin pensar en las consecuencias. ¿Dónde está su humanidad, Hermana? El mundo no es blanco o negro».
languages.original_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: «De eso trata la fe "verdadera". De disparar primero y preguntar después, de sacrificar al inocente sin pensar en las consecuencias. ¿Dónde está su humanidad, Hermana? El mundo no es blanco o negro».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Darum geht es bei 'wahrem' Glauben wirklich. Erst schießen und dann Fragen stellen. Die Unschuldigen opfern, ohne an die Konsequenzen zu denken. Was ist mit Eurer Menschlichkeit, Schwester? Die Welt zerfällt nicht in Schwarz und Weiß."
languages.original_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: "Darum geht es bei 'wahrem' Glauben wirklich. Erst schießen und dann Fragen stellen. Die Unschuldigen opfern, ohne an die Konsequenzen zu denken. Was ist mit Eurer Menschlichkeit, Schwester? Die Welt zerfällt nicht in Schwarz und Weiß."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "İşte 'gerçek' inanç budur. Önce sıkacaksın, sonra sorgulayacaksın. Sonuçlarını düşünmeden masumları feda edeceksin. İnsanlığına ne oldu Rahibe? Dünya öyle siyah beyaz değil."
languages.original_text: "This is what 'true' faith is really about. Shooting first and asking questions later. Sacrificing the innocent without thinking of the consequences. Where is your humanity, Sister? The world is not divided into black and white."

traits.locale_text: "İşte "gerçek" inanç budur. Önce sıkacaksın, sonra sorgulayacaksın. Sonuçlarını düşünmeden masumları feda edeceksin. İnsanlığına ne oldu Rahibe? Dünya öyle siyah beyaz değil."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
